rows.name: facilitator_message_1
rows.value:
**Hello! My name is @fields.facilitator_name. I’m so glad you’re here!**

I’ll be helping you learn using @global.app_name! In the next few steps, I’ll ask you a few questions, so that I can make your learning experience just right for you!

rows.name: question_user_facilitator
rows.value: Are you with a facilitator now?

rows.name: question_user_facilitator_group
rows.value: What is your facilitator's Group ID?

rows.name: facilitator_message_2
rows.value:
**Let’s get started!**
 
Can you tell me a little about yourself?

rows.name: question_child_gender
rows.value: Is your child a girl or a boy?

rows.name: question_child_age
rows.value: How many years old is your child?

rows.name: child_age_input_restriction
rows.value: @global.app_name only supports parents of children between 2 and 7.

rows.name: facilitator_message_3
rows.value:
**Thanks @fields.user_name.**

Can you tell me more about your child? You might have more than one, but we're going to start by focusing on just one.

rows.name: facilitator_selection_1
rows.value: Welcome to @global.app_name! To participate, you'll need a partner in parenting. There are 2 parenting experts to choose from:

rows.name: facilitator_selection_2
rows.value: Welcome to @global.app_name! We’re so happy you’re here! Let’s find the right guide to support you in your parenting. Who would you like to learn with?

rows.name: facilitator_selection_3
rows.value: Hi, I am @fields.facilitator_name! I am a mother of three and work as a paediatrician. I believe that all parents can learn how to raise children who feel safe, loved, and confident when they are given the right support.

rows.name: facilitator_selection_4
rows.value: Hi, I am @fields.facilitator_name! I am a father of four and work as a school counsellor. I believe that simple parenting skills can help you to stay calm, and guide children with love.

rows.name: facilitator_selection_5
rows.value: Who would you like to learn with?

rows.name: facilitator_selection_intro
rows.value: Welcome to @global.app_name! We’re so happy you’re here! Let’s find the right guide to support you in your parenting journey.

rows.name: facilitator_female_intro
rows.value: Hi, I’m @data.characters.facilitator_female.name! I am a mother of three and work as a paediatrician. I believe that all parents can learn how to raise children who feel safe, loved, and confident when they are given the right support.

rows.name: facilitator_male_intro
rows.value: Hi, I am @data.characters.facilitator_male.name! I am a father of four and work as a school counsellor. I believe that simple parenting skills can help you to stay calm, and guide children with love.

rows.name: facilitator_selection_question
rows.value: Who would you like to learn with?

rows.name: facilitator_message_3_multipe_child
rows.value:
**Thanks @fields.user_name.**

Can you tell me more about your child? You might have more than one, but we're going to start by focusing on just one.

rows.name: question_child_age_multipe_child
rows.value: How many years old is your child you are focusing on?
